q: As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said, "I care deeply about animals" and "am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals." He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to "propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Dwaine Caraway said he would "welcome a clarification of the guidelines." texrus This

The 51-year-old congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after easily winning in November for a sixth term from his eastern Indiana district. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. Steve Ballmer announced the latest changes Wednesday in an e-mail to Microsoft employees. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," Steve Ballmer wrote. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. Steve Ballmer also disclosed that Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft. Art collection. This work is a stunning and dramatic addition to the capital city's skyline, made possible in partnership with the Canadian National Capital Commission( NCC). As the National Gallery of Canada describes: Made from unyielding, stainless steel pipes used in manufacturing and heavy industry, One Hundred Foot Line is a masterful example of Roxy Paine 's intense fascination with trees and his technical ability to create sublime structures from industrial materials. One Hundred Foot Line presents a meandering tree trunk that has lost not only its leaves but all of its branches. The tallest of Roxy Paine 's Dendroids to date, the artist has welded together dozens of stainless steel cylinders into a seamless whole. 's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. CEO Mike Zafirovski articulates the company assets but says it was overly complex to make decisions and assign accountability. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
